name: ManhattanMidpointLocator
description: A ManhattanMidpointLocator that is used to place figures at the midpoint of a Manhatten routed connection. The midpoint is always in the center of an edge.

functions.name: init
functions.description: Constructs a ManhattanMidpointLocator with associated Connection c.

functions.name: relocate
functions.description: Relocates the given Figure always in the center of an edge.

constructor.name: ManhattanMidpointLocator
